result.arabic_text: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Ukuri kw’amabwirizwa y’ubwislamu kwaramaze kuja ahabona, ikinyoma c’ubugarariji na co kiraheza kirazimangana, kigenda amazimayongo, ntikiriko kiragaruka bushasha kandi ngo gitanguzwe”.
